title: China and Russia Visa-Free for 72 hours if you DO THIS! Frugal Travel Guy

type_specific.selection: We all know you can’t go to Russia or China without jumping through hoops to secure a costly visa. Times are changing quickly however and with capitalism  making its way into the main stream of these  countries, there is the realization that the economic benefits of allowing tourists to hang out (and spend money) during […]
